tidbits.title: Recent Independence
tidbits.description: Kosovo declared its independence from Serbia in 2008, becoming one of the world's newest countries, though its status remains disputed.

tidbits.title: Cultural and Historical Sites
tidbits.description: The region boasts cultural and historical sites like the Graƒçanica Monastery and the ancient city of Prizren, reflecting its diverse heritage.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: Kosovo offers natural beauty with scenic landscapes, mountains like the Accursed Mountains, and picturesque rural areas.
